A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: For me The Last Jedi gave us a very unique aspect of the characters the original trilogy gave us to the characters introduced in The Force Awakens. The Last Jedi might be my 11th Favorite film this year and if I rank on my Star Wars movie list would be number 5. I HIGHLY recommend you seeing this film and do not care what the general audience thinks. I still need to see the film again myself to pick up what I missed. I will wait for week 2 to add to the box office :)!
